CustomField.formula: IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" & TEXT( (IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Email )), 1, 0)) + (IF(NOT(ISBLANK( City__c )), 1, 0)) + (IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Interest_COB__c )), 1, 0)) + (IF( Task__c , 1, 0)) + (IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Address__c )), 1, 0)) ) & "00.gif", "rating" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Field berikut harus diisi
1. Task (Minimal 3)
2. Email
3. City
4. Interest COB
5. Address
CustomField.label: Lead scoring
